1. While AI wipes out entry level roles, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says it's actually 'the most exciting time to be starting out one's career'  Fortune
  2. OpenAI's CEO Sam Altman says in 10 years time college graduates will be working 'some completely new, exciting, super well-paid' job in space  Fortune
  3. ‘My Kid Will Never Ever Be Smarter Than an AI’: OpenAI’s Sam Altman Warns Most Kids Won’t Know a World Without AI  Yahoo Finance
  4. Mark Cuban and Sam Altman just warned about disappearing jobs and the need to learn AI  Fast Company
  5. OpenAI chief Sam Altman says future AI could help people have more kids  India Today

item.description:
1. ‘Cheapfake’ AI Celeb Videos Are Rage-Baiting People on YouTube  WIRED

  4. Fake YouTubia  Komando.com
